text_patches.GUI_WARNING_NOT_RANDO_GAME_1: {c2}Error!{c0}|This save slot was created using a different Randomizer mod.
text_patches.GUI_WARNING_NOT_RANDO_GAME_2: You must start a New Game from a blank save slot. Returning to title screen.

spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Artaria - Charge Tutorial
Cataris - EMMI Zone Hidden Missile Room
Ghavoran - Above Pulse Radar
spoiler_log.Progressive Charge Beam:
Artaria - EMMI Zone First Entrance
Burenia - Early Gravity Speedboost Room 1
spoiler_log.Progressive Missile:
Cataris - Above Z-57 Fight
Dairon - Save Station West Tunnels
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Artaria - Screw Attack Room
Cataris - EMMI Zone Exits West
spoiler_log.Progressive Bomb:
Artaria - Melee Tutorial Room
Ferenia - Space Jump Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Spin:
Dairon - Wide Beam Room
Ferenia - Energy Recharge Station Secret
